Description: Collection shells: strung as beads, comprising sixty 'Ancillaria', three 'Nerita', and and one 'Natica' shell.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Badari, el-, Grave 4803 From a distrubed burial
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton & G. Caton-Thompson, ‘The Badarian Civilization’ (London, 1928), 4; Grave register, pl. V.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (67)
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
